Logging onto the Application

Before you can create a new project or open an existing project, you must select a server configuration for the project and log on.

To log onto the application:

  1. Start the application from an icon on your desktop or by running Start > Programs > StarTeam client_name.

  2. From the Project menu, select New or Open. If you have not previously logged on, this displays the Log On to [Server Name] dialog.

  3. Enter a User name and Password in the appropriate text boxes. Passwords are case sensitive and may have length restrictions.

  4. Select the Save as default credentials for this server text box.

  5. Click OK. The New Project Wizard or Open Project Wizard displays, allowing you to work on a project.

    6. In the Windows client, logging in also displays the Toolbar icon in your system tray. This Toolbar allows you to cache a default credential for each server you access during a work session, thus reducing the number of times you need to log onto the same server.

  6. To see the list of servers for which you currently have default configurations, click the Toolbar icon, and select Open.

  7. To access several server configurations with only one logon, double click the Toolbar icon and select the Use same user name/password for each server option.
